titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the freight rail industry.
Recognizing and honoring the freight railroad industry and its employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 111-542.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 217.

action.text: Mr. Costello moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1366.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 411 - 0, 2 Present (Roll no. 472).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/27/2010--Passed House amended. Recognizes the contributions the freight rail industry and its employees have made to the national transportation system. Supports the industry's and employees' efforts to continue improving safety as our nation moves forward to develop its infrastructure.
